name: com.ojanck.audiomanager
description: A simple Audio Manager that utilize Unity's Addressables and Resources for loading and downloading the Audios.

samples.description:
An example scene featuring the use of AudioObject and its power variable.
The example is using audios from [FREE Casual Game SFX Pack](https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-54116) by Dustyroom and [Casual Game Music: Happy, Bouncy, Social](https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/casual-game-music-happy-bouncy-social-214104) by Intersonic Sound.
